textContent.title:
Hi, I'm
<highlight>MikoÅ‚aj PÄ™cak</highlight>
textContent.text:
I'm a programmer with 7 years of commercial experience. I primarily develop in the direction of <bold>creating frontend layers of web applications</bold> and mobile apps. I passionately pursue my interests while being the owner of my own brand <itpulse>IT Pulse</itpulse>, under which I establish freelance collaborations and more.

Thanks to my work ethic and determination acquired during many years of sports career, I make rapid progress <bold>in every activity I undertake</bold>. By achieving the milestones I set for myself, I become a better programmer and a <bold>trustworthy entrepreneur</bold> with each passing day. I believe that hard work pays off, and small steps lead to spectacular results.

Feel free to get to know me on this website and on my <linkedin>LinkedIn</linkedin> profile.

work.title: Collaboration
work.text: I am currently available for freelance work or other forms of collaboration

header.title: Curriculum Vitae
header.description: Overview of my professional experience, skills, and education.

experience.mugDescription:
- Managing the frontend team within the project
- Collaborating with the backend team on REST API integration and data flow optimization
- Active participation in sprint planning, estimations, and team process improvements
- Co-creating design systems
- Designing and implementing responsive user interfaces using React library
- Creating UI components using TypeScript, styled-components, and libraries such as Material UI
- Maintaining high code quality through code review and following best practices
- Mentoring junior team members and participating in recruitment
experience.moodUpDescription: Creating and developing mobile applications for iOS devices

- Mechanic

experience.ekDescription: Entering company inventory into the online store and assisting with inventory management
experience.ibDescription:
- Customer service in mobile phone repair
- Assistance in the accounting department
- Managing company's Facebook profile
